item.description:
The Alien Architects Roundtable welcomes Andrea Rutledge CAE, executive director of the National Architectural Accrediting Board; Pei Liu PhD, project coordinator for the Education Evaluation Services for Architects (EESA) program; and Greg Hall AIA, PhD, education director for the National Council of Architectural Registration Boards.

Join the group to discuss the registration process, the online EESA application and the Broadly Experienced Architects and Broadly Experienced Foreign Architects programs.

PLEASE RSVP to bsa@architects.org or 617-951-1433 x221. The BSA will provide pizza, beer and other beverages and we need to know how much food to order.

The meeting is free and open to all. Most BSA committee/network programs offer continuing-education credits for all Massachusetts and AIA architects.


Leonardi Aray, Assoc. AIA
Gaia Grazia Giudicelli, Assoc. AIA
Co-chairs, BSA Alien Architects Roundtable
item.how_to_find_us: Take the elevator to the 5th floor.
item.name: Meet with NAAB, EESA and NCARB leadership
